title: Fix admin panel black screen routing issue in production

requirements.text: Fix the /admin-panel route configuration to resolve the black screen issue in production deployment at mhs-online-earn-platform.caffeine.xyz

quotes: The /admin-panel is showing a black screen even after production deployment

acceptanceCriteria: The /admin-panel route loads without a black screen on the live domain
The admin login form is visible and functional at https://mhs-online-earn-platform.caffeine.xyz/admin-panel
Users can successfully navigate to /admin-panel from the browser address bar
No console errors related to routing appear when accessing /admin-panel

requirements.text: Verify that the admin login functionality works correctly at /admin-panel using the credentials 'admin' and 'habibur123', and successfully redirects to the admin panel dashboard after authentication

quotes: Please fix the routing for the Admin Panel immediately so I can log in using 'admin' and 'habibur123'

acceptanceCriteria: The admin login form accepts username 'admin' and password 'habibur123'
Successful authentication redirects to the admin panel dashboard displaying the UserManagementTable and TaskManagementPanel components
Invalid credentials display an appropriate error message

requirements.text: Ensure the /admin-panel route is accessible on the live production domain without requiring Internet Identity authentication

quotes: Ensure it is accessible on the live domain

acceptanceCriteria: The /admin-panel route loads using local authentication only (no Internet Identity required)
The route works correctly in both development and production environments
The AdminLogin page renders properly at /admin-panel before authentication
After successful login, the AdminPanel page displays with user and task management interfaces

constraints: Use the existing local authentication system with hardcoded credentials (admin/habibur123)
Do not require Internet Identity authentication for admin panel access
Maintain the existing two-step admin flow: AdminLogin page â†’ AdminPanel dashboard
nonGoals: Implementing a new authentication system for admin users
Adding additional admin roles or permissions
Modifying the admin credentials or authentication method
Creating new admin features beyond fixing the routing issue
